Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::CustomerTicketMessage###ServiceAsSubject
Setting.Description: Copy the chosen service into the subject field.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::CustomerTicketMessage###ServiceAsSubject-Substitutions
Setting.Description: Substitutes the regular expression in the key with the value (can be empty) for services which are set as subject.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::CustomerTicketMessage###DynamicFieldAsBody
Setting.Description: Copy the chosen dynamicfield content into the body field (Please add the name of the field). If no value exists we use "-".
